title: Student
text: Very nice place with small streets with a lot of restaurants and bars. Good food in italian restaurants. Brownâ€™s restaurant is very good and nice coctails

title: Excellent service and polite driver
text:
The best service. I recommend them. My driver help us around Brighton when I needed help to move my son in Sussex campus. He waited for us to unload and he made sure that my son took his room key.
When I was going back to Gatwick airport there were road works on the highway and I was going to loose my flight and he make arrangements with another taxi driver to pick me up from a bridge so I was able finally to take my flight. Thanks a lot. My driver name is Elvis.
Sure I feel that there is someone in Brighton that can help my son if he needs something.
